Vigilance
[i]Knights of Ostia[/i] – Knights you control have rampage 2. [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)[/i]
[i]Armor Expertise[/i] – Whenever a Knight you control blocks, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a shield counter on that creature. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {1}{R}{G}
